turns.text: sure - it could have been calculated - to hold him accountable and pull him into the international spotlight more - but they still bestowed this honor on him , and it would tarnish their reputation if they awarded it exclusively for this reason - with all the pride they have for their country , i do n't think they would do this with what is at stake - although it could have been a factor

turns.speaker: julie
turns.text: what presidents promise and what they do are two different categories

turns.text: yeah - proly not - but a lot of times there is disagreement , just maybe not as much - the other issue , is that people usually do n't pay attention unless it 's someone we all have heard of or can relate to - i mean how many people know who won the nobel prize previously ?

turns.speaker: macy

turns.text: no - it has international consequences - to see someone ascend the social structure from such a poor , victimized segment of the population - all the way to the presidency - and talk about things like cooperation and working together , that sets a precedent for his presidency and gives other nations a reason to hope for the U.S. 's cooperation
